snippet: The Santa Fe Opera said its next commissioned work would be “The (R)evolution of Steve Jobs,” which will receive its first workshop in September in San Francisco.
abstract: Santa Fe Opera announces Mason Bates and Mark Campbell opera The (R)evolution of Steve Jobs will be its next commissioned work; opera is scheduled to premiere in summer 2017.
lead_paragraph: The Santa Fe Opera said its next commissioned work would be “The (R)evolution of Steve Jobs,” which will receive its first workshop in September in San Francisco.

headline.main: A Steve Jobs Opera Is Up Next for the Santa Fe Company
headline.print_headline: Up Next: Opera About Steve Jobs
